articles.title: Reddit Mods Sued by YouTuber Ethan Klein Fight Efforts to Unmask Them - 404 Media
articles.description: Klein has attempted to subpoena Discord and Reddit for information that would reveal the identity of moderators of a subreddit critical of him. The moderators' lawyers fear their clients will be physically attacked if the subpoenas go through.
